title: Biden bans Russian oil, warns of higher prices at US pumps - The Associated Press - en Español
content:
1. Biden bans Russian oil, warns of higher prices at US pumps  The Associated Press - en Español
  2. Biden announces ban on US imports of Russian oil, warns gas prices will 'go up further'  Fox Business
  3. Russian Oil Ban: What It Could Mean For New Hampshire Gas Prices  Concord, NH Patch
  4. Opinion | Praise for ‘Biden’s Courage’ in Imposing Oil Sanctions Against Russia  The New York Times
  5. Wall St slips on concerns about Russia oil ban  Reuters.com
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: WASHINGTON (AP) — President Joe Biden announced Tuesday the U.S. will ban all Russian oil imports , toughening the toll on Russia’s economy in retaliation for its invasion of Ukraine,   but he acknowledged it will bring costs to Americans, particularly  at the gas pump .
